attributes.action: Bring in laws to stop vendors pulling out of house sales at the last minute
attributes.additional_details:
so if you agree  this should be  adopted such policies as Scotland that once the sale is agreed your locked in please sign my petition. 

please can I also ask you to share the petition so as many people can see it and sign it. 

kindest regards Zo
attributes.background: I would like the government to bring in laws like Scotland to protect buyers against house vendors pulling out of a sale at the last minute.
